content.en: Missile guidance algorithms: Researchers have developed various algorithms to address different research questions in the field of missile guidance. These algorithms are used to design novel guidance laws, construct cooperative guidance models, achieve integrated guidance and control, and develop robust impact angle constraint guidance laws. The algorithms are based on advanced control techniques such as sliding mode control, backstepping, model predictive control, and adaptive control, among others. These advancements in algorithmic design contribute to the development of more effective and efficient missile guidance systems.
content.da: Missil-styringsalgoritmer: Forskere har udviklet forskellige algoritmer for at tackle forskellige forskningsspørgsmål inden for missilstyring. Disse algoritmer bruges til at designe nye styringslove, konstruere kooperative styringsmodeller, opnå integreret styring og kontrol samt udvikle robuste styringslove med vinkelbegrænsning ved nedslag. Algoritmerne er baseret på avancerede kontrolteknikker såsom slidende mode kontrol, backstepping, modellforudsigende kontrol og adaptiv kontrol, blandt andre. Disse fremskridt inden for algoritmedesign bidrager til udviklingen af mere effektive og effektive missilstyringssystemer.
